original: @143a * // de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs smon lam gyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @143a * // de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs smon lam gyi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathagata Avalokitesvara-pranidhana-indra.

original: rgyal sras rnams kyis bsgrub pa ni //
analyzed: rgyal sras rnams kyis bsgrub pa ni //
translated: The practice of the sons of the Victorious Ones

original: sems can rnams la phan brtson pas //
analyzed: sems can rnams la phan brtson pas //
translated: Is to strive to benefit sentient beings.

original: smon lam rgya mtsho spyod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: smon lam rgya mtsho spyod pa'i phyir //
translated: Since they engage in an ocean of aspirations,

original: de yi dbang gyur 'di bshad bya //
analyzed: de yi dbang gyur 'di bshad bya //
translated: This is explained to be under their power.

original: sngon nas bsnyen pa'i rim pa la //
analyzed: sngon nas bsnyen pa'i rim pa la //
translated: In the stages of prior approximation,

original: 'dris gyur snying rjes yid gdungs pa //
analyzed: 'dris gyur snying rjes yid gdungs pa //
translated: One should meditate on the three bindus of love and so forth

original: mig dang smin mtshams snying dkyil du //
analyzed: mig dang smin mtshams snying dkyil du //
translated: At the eyes, the brow, and the center of the heart,

original: byams sogs thig le gsum bsgom bya //
analyzed: byams sogs thig le gsum bsgom bya //
translated: With a mind tormented by the compassion of acquaintance.

original: nyi ma'i 'od dang zla ba'i 'od //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od dang zla ba'i 'od //
translated: The light of the sun and the light of the moon

original: de ni thugs rje mi phyed 'ong //
analyzed: de ni thugs rje mi phyed 'ong //
translated: Are the indivisible compassion that arises.

original: lus can rnams kyi snying dang ni //
analyzed: lus can rnams kyi snying dang ni //
translated: In the hearts of embodied beings

original: nyon mongs me lce de nang gnas //
analyzed: nyon mongs me lce de nang gnas //
translated: Lies the tongue of the fire of affliction.

original: de bzhin spyi gtsug grangs bzhin du //
analyzed: de bzhin spyi gtsug grangs bzhin du //
translated: Likewise, on the crown of the head,

original: padma zlum dang ram rdo rje //
analyzed: padma zlum dang ram rdo rje //
translated: The round lotus, the moon, and the vajra

original: gang tshe skye bo don tshol ba dang don mi tshol ba gcig dang mang po yang rung ste /
analyzed: gang tshe skye bo don tshol ba dang don mi tshol ba gcig dang mang po yang rung ste /
translated: When a person, whether one or many, is seeking the meaning,

original: bdag gi dbang po'i spyod yul du 'bab pas las la sbyar du rung @143b bar gyur pa dang / cho ga 'dis rnal 'byor du byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la gsol ba btab ste /
analyzed: bdag gi dbang po'i spyod yul du 'bab pas las la sbyar du rung @143b bar gyur pa dang / cho ga 'dis rnal 'byor du byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la gsol ba btab ste /
translated: Having performed the yoga with this rite, I supplicate ƒÄrya Avalokite≈õvara:

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus su myur ba kho nar sems can khyed cag bdag gis smin pa'i gdul byar gyur cig ces smon lam btab la /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus su myur ba kho nar sems can khyed cag bdag gis smin pa'i gdul byar gyur cig ces smon lam btab la /
translated: ‚ÄúMay you sentient beings become my disciples to be ripened quickly in the future.‚Äù

original: nyi 'od thig les de dag padmo kha phyed nas //
analyzed: nyi 'od thig les de dag padmo kha phyed nas //
translated: With the light rays of the sun, open the lotuses.

original: zla 'od can gyis gdung ba 'bar ba zhi bar bya //
analyzed: zla 'od can gyis gdung ba 'bar ba zhi bar bya //
translated: With the light rays of the moon, pacify the burning heat.

original: mi phyed zer gyis lus bkang rdo rje'i rgyas btab la //
analyzed: mi phyed zer gyis lus bkang rdo rje'i rgyas btab la //
translated: With the light rays of indestructibility, fill the body and seal it with the vajra.

original: ci dgar khyed spyod ma lus myur du bdag gis bsgral //
analyzed: ci dgar khyed spyod ma lus myur du bdag gis bsgral //
translated: Enjoy as you wish. I will quickly liberate all.

original: de rjes chos dang zang zing sbyin //
analyzed: de rjes chos dang zang zing sbyin //
translated: After that, give the Dharma and material things.

original: mgu bya kun gyis sems bkug nas //
analyzed: mgu bya kun gyis sems bkug nas //
translated: Having attracted the mind with all pleasing things,

original: glang chen myos la lcags kyu bzhin //
analyzed: glang chen myos la lcags kyu bzhin //
translated: like a hook for a crazed elephant,

original: mkhas pas 'gro ba dbang du bya //
analyzed: mkhas pas 'gro ba dbang du bya //
translated: the wise one controls the world.

original: me tog la sogs brdas gtod pa'am //
analyzed: me tog la sogs brdas gtod pa'am //
translated: The commitment is given with a flower, and so on,

original: yang na lag pa rkang pa med //
analyzed: yang na lag pa rkang pa med //
translated: or else with no hands or feet.

original: yun ring dmigs ltas mda' bsnun pa'am //
analyzed: yun ring dmigs ltas mda' bsnun pa'am //
translated: For a long time, he has been a target for the arrows of the signs of aging.

original: bdag nyid chen po thabs la mkhas //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po thabs la mkhas //
translated: The great man is skilled in means.üîΩLike a magnet and iron filings,

original: kha ba rnams kyis ni khab len dang // bung pa rnams kyis me tog bzhin //üîΩde ni mi 'dod nyin gcig kyang //
analyzed: kha ba rnams kyis ni khab len dang // bung pa rnams kyis me tog bzhin // de ni mi 'dod nyin gcig kyang //
translated: like bees and flowers,üîΩhe gathers people, even against their will,

original: dbang med skye bo 'du bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang med skye bo 'du bar 'gyur //
translated: without desiring to do so.

original: smon lam du bya ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: smon lam du bya ba rdzogs so//
translated: The Aspiration Prayer is complete.
